mapper.select: SELECT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, A.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn FROM trv_prd A JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd WHERE act_yn=1

SELECT prd_cd, prd_dtl_cd, prd_nm, DATE_FORMAT(dom_dpr_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dom_dpr_date, DATE_FORMAT(dom_fin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dom_fin_date, arl_nm, rsvt_yn, FORMAT(prd_str_prc,0) AS prd_str_prc FROM trv_prd_dtl WHERE prd_cd = #{prd_cd}

SELECT DISTINCT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, D.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn,D.usr_id,A.dpr_day FROM trv_prd A LEFT OUTER JOIN att_prd D ON A.prd_cd = D.prd_cd JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN dstn_ctg F ON A.cntn_cd = F.cntn_cd WHERE act_yn=1 and A.cntn_cd = #{cntn_cd} and A.nt_cd = #{nt_cd} and F.nt_cd_nm = #{nt_cd_nm} and ((D.usr_id = #{usr_id} or D.usr_id IS NULL) OR D.usr_id <> #{usr_id})

SELECT DISTINCT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, D.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn,D.usr_id,A.dpr_day FROM trv_prd A LEFT OUTER JOIN att_prd D ON A.prd_cd = D.prd_cd JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN dstn_ctg F ON A.cntn_cd = F.cntn_cd WHERE act_yn=1 and A.cntn_cd = #{cntn_cd} and A.nt_cd = #{nt_cd} and F.nt_cd_nm = #{nt_cd_nm} and ((D.usr_id = #{usr_id} or D.usr_id IS NULL) OR D.usr_id <> #{usr_id}) ORDER BY ${keyword} ${standard}

SELECT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, A.prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, D.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn,D.usr_id,A.dpr_day FROM trv_prd A LEFT OUTER JOIN att_prd D ON A.prd_cd = D.prd_cd JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd WHERE act_yn=1

SELECT A.prd_cd,A.dstn_cd,A.prd_nm,A.trv_per,A.dpr_str_date,A.dpr_fin_date,B.arl_nm,B.pr_rsvt_cnt, B.min_stt_cnt,B.max_stt_cnt,B.loc_dpr_date,B.loc_fin_date,B.dom_dpr_date,B.dom_fin_date ,B.prd_dtl_cd,C.adt_prc,C.chd_prc,C.bb_prc,D.img_pth,D.mn_img_yn FROM trv_prd A JOIN trv_prd_dtl B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN prd_prc C ON B.prd_dtl_cd = C.prd_dtl_cd JOIN prd_img D ON A.prd_cd = D.prd_cd WHERE B.prd_dtl_cd = #{prd_dtl_cd}

SELECT A.prd_cd, A.dstn_cd, A.cmn_cd_thm, A.prd_nm, A.prd_dtl_desc, A.trv_per, FORMAT(A.prd_str_prc,0) AS prd_str_prc, A.dpr_str_date, A.dpr_fin_date, A.evnt_yn, A.fin_yn, A.act_yn, A.dc_yn, A.pc_prc, A.vcnt, D.lk_yn, B.img_pth, B.mn_img_yn,D.usr_id,A.dpr_day FROM trv_prd A LEFT OUTER JOIN att_prd D ON A.prd_cd = D.prd_cd JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd WHERE act_yn=1 AND A.prd_cd = #{prd_cd}
SELECT A.prd_cd,A.prd_nm,A.prd_str_prc,B.img_pth FROM trv_prd A JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd JOIN att_prd C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd WHERE C.usr_id = #{usr_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM att_prd WHERE usr_id = #{usr_id} AND prd_cd = #{prd_cd}
